title-part.text: APPARATUS OR ARRANGEMENTS FOR TAKING PHOTOGRAPHS OR FOR PROJECTING OR VIEWING THEM
APPARATUS OR ARRANGEMENTS EMPLOYING ANALOGOUS TECHNIQUES USING WAVES OTHER THAN OPTICAL WAVES

reference.text: optical parts of such apparatus G02B; photosensitive materials or processes for photographic purposes G03C; apparatus for processing exposed photographic materials G03D

note.note-paragraph: This subclass covers, as far as processes are concerned, only processes characterised by the use or manipulation of apparatus classifiable per se in this subclass.
In this subclass, the following term is used with the meaning indicated: "camera" means apparatus or arrangements for taking photographs.
In this subclass non-limiting references (in the sense of paragraph 39 of the Guide to the IPC) may still be displayed in the scheme.

title-part.text: Details common to at least two of the following types of apparatus: cameras, projectors, printers

reference.text: details common to cameras only G03B7/00 - G03B17/00, to projectors only G03B21/00, G03B23/00, to printers only G03B27/00

title-part.text: Moving film strip by pull on end thereof
rotated by lever operated ratchet and pawl
rotated by band, chain, rack, or other linear reciprocating operation
Special arrangements to ensure constant length of movement of film
Moving film strip by means which act on the film between the ends thereof
Claws or pins engaging holes in the film
Sprockets engaging holes in the film
Spiked wheels or pins not penetrating the film
embodying Geneva motion, e.g. Maltese-cross gearing
Guiding, framing, or constraining film in desired position relative to lens system
Rollers engaging face of film, e.g. barrel, waisted, conical
Gates or pressure devices, e.g. plate
adjustable or interchangeable, e.g. for different film widths
Measuring or indicating length of the used or unused film
by means which as certain the radius of the film coiled on a spool
Focusing arrangements of general interest for cameras, projectors or printers
adjusting position of image plane without moving lens
using movable reflectors to alter length of light path
Adjustment of optical system relative to image or object surface other than for focusing
Swinging lens about normal to the optical axis
Control of exposure by setting shutters, diaphragms or filters, separately or conjointly

reference.text: control of exposure in television cameras by means of circuitry influencing the optical part of the camera H04N5/238

note.note-paragraph:
Group G03B7/00 is impacted by reclassification into groups G03B7/01 and G03B7/30.
Groups G03B7/00, G03B7/01 and G03B7/30 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

CPC-specific-text.text: setting of both shutter and diaphragm
setting of both diaphragm and distance

title-part.text: with selection of either manual or automatic mode

note.note-paragraph:
Group G03B7/01 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group G03B7/00.
Groups G03B7/00 and G03B7/01 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: Control effected by setting a graduated member on the camera in accordance with indication or reading afforded by a light meter, which may be either separate from or built into camera body
Control effected by hand adjustment of a member that senses indication of a pointer of a built- in light-sensitive device, e.g. by restoring point to a fixed associated reference mark
by a follow-up movement of an associated reference mark to the pointer
Control effected solely on the basis of the response, to the intensity of the light received by the camera, of a built-in light-sensitive device

note.note-paragraph:
Group G03B7/0807 is no longer used for the classification of documents as of 2014-07-01. The content of this group is being reclassified into groups G03B7/081 - G03B7/097.
Until reclassification is complete, groups G03B7/0807 and G03B7/081 - G03B7/097 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

Groups G03B7/081 - G03B7/089 are incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group G03B7/0807.
Group G03B7/0807 should be considered when searching any group of the range G03B7/081 - G03B7/089 in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: for control of both exposure time and aperture
for storage of exposure value in mirror reflex cameras

note.note-paragraph:
Groups G03B7/091 - G03B7/097 are incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group G03B7/0807.
Group G03B7/0807 should be considered when searching any group of the range G03B7/091 - G03B7/097 in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: for control of both exposure time and aperture
Arrangement of photoelectric elements in or on the camera

CPC-specific-text.text: on the camera or in the objective
using the mirror as sensor light reflecting or transmitting member
using the film or shutter as sensor light reflecting member
the sensor being mounted in, before, or behind the porro-prism
Protection against viewer backlight or integration of the viewer light into the measured light

title-part.text: a servo-motor providing energy to move the setting member

a hand-actuated member moved from one position to another providing the energy to move the setting member, e.g. depression of shutter release button causes a stepped feeler to co-operate with the pointer of the light-sensitive device to set the diaphragm and thereafter release the shutter
setting of both shutter and diaphragm aperture being effected so as to give the optimum compromise between depth of field and shortness of exposure

in accordance with both the intensity of the flash source and the distance of the flash source from the object, e.g. in accordance with the "guide number" of the flash bulb and the focusing of the camera

note.note-paragraph:
Group G03B7/16 is impacted by reclassification into group G03B7/17.
Groups G03B7/16 and G03B7/17 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: Selection of modes in flash units by exposure control arrangements

note.note-paragraph:
Group G03B7/17 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group G03B7/16.
Groups G03B7/16 and G03B7/17 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: in accordance with light-reducing "factor" of filter or other obturator used with or on the lens of the camera
in accordance with change of lens
in accordance with temperature or height, e.g. in aircraft
automatically in accordance with markings or other means indicating film speed or kind of film on the magazine to be inserted in the camera

Circuitry to measure or to take account of the object contrast

Group G03B7/30 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group G03B7/00.
Groups G03B7/00 and G03B7/30 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: with means for presetting the diaphragm
Blade or disc rotating or pivoting about axis normal to its plane
Two relatively-adjustable aperture-defining members moving as a unit
Two separate members moving in opposite directions
Two separate members moving in the same direction
each moving in a single direction first to open and then to reclose
each moving in one direction to open and then in opposite direction to close, e.g. iris type
Adjusting size of aperture formed by members when fully open so as to constitute a virtual diaphragm that is adjustable

with mechanism controlling relative movement of blinds to form slot
Single rigid plate with multiple slots or other apertures
with mechanism controlling relative movement of plates to form slot
Flap shutters pivoting about axis in plane of flap
Rotating plate with axis of rotation inclined to optical axis of shutter
Means for varying duration of "open" period of shutter
by varying speed of movement of obturating members
by varying interval of time between end of opening movement and beginning of closing movement
Mechanism for delaying opening of shutter
Means for cocking shutter separate from means for releasing shutter
Cocking effected by movement of film
Filters or other obturators specially adapted for photographic purposes
Hoods or caps for eliminating unwanted light from lenses, viewfinders or focusing aids

title-part.text: characterised by the nature of the surface
Means for mounting individual pictures to be projected, e.g. frame for transparency
Devices for changing pictures in viewing apparatus or projectors

note.note-paragraph: For the purposes of this group the term "picture" denotes any flat representation, whether transparent or not, e.g. produced by photography, writing or printing

title-part.text: in which a picture is removed from a stock and returned to the same stock or another one

CPC-specific-text.text: whereby the picture is not returned to the same stock after projection
whereby the picture is returned to the same stock

title-part.text: in which pictures are attached to a movable carrier

Introducing or correcting distortion, e.g. in connection with oblique projection

Cameras having the shape of other objects

note.note-paragraph: When classification is made in this main group, further classification should be made in other groups of subclass G03B or in group G02B7/00 according to the functional aspects of the camera. The classification symbol of this group is not listed first when assigned to patent documents.

Group G03B30/00 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from groups G02B7/00, G02B7/02, G02B7/021, G02B7/022, G02B7/023, G02B7/027, G02B7/028, G02B7/04, G02B7/06, G02B7/09, G02B7/10, G02B7/102, G02B7/105, G02B13/001, G02B13/0015, G02B13/002, G02B13/0025, G02B13/003, G02B13/0035, G02B13/004, G02B13/0045, G02B13/005, G02B13/0055, G02B13/006, G02B13/0065, G02B13/007, G02B13/0075, G02B13/008, G02B13/0085, G02B13/009, G03B5/00, G03B17/02, G03B17/04, G03B17/08, and G03B17/55.
All groups listed in this Warning should be considered in order to perform a complete search.
